pageContent: Methods: Salvage surgery was done in 43 patients who did not respond to radiation therapy of prostate cancer between 1982-1991. Thirty-five patients underwent salvage prostatectomy and 8, cystoprostatectomy.

metaData.source:
[Locally advanced prostate cancer. Definition, diagnosis and treatment]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29633943/
